alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 06 at 3:22PM CDT until October 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...DANGEROUS FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS FOR SOUTHEAST ALABAMA AND PARTS OF THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE SATURDAY AFTERNOON... The combination of breezy post-frontal northwesterly winds, critically low humidities, and very dry fuels with ongoing drought conditions will make for dangerous fire weather on Saturday. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHEAST ALABAMA... * AFFECTED AREA...Coffee, Dale, Henry, Geneva and Houston. * WIND...Northwest around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...20 to 24 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
